content: crochet your own **jumbo fleece teddy & bunny** using special fleece sherpa yarn these cuddly stuffies are so soft and fluffy and will be cherished by loved ones you will need 2 skeins of go for fleece sherpa yarn in honey for the teddy bear and 3 skeins of go for fleece sherpa yarn in cream for the bunny this special fleece yarn blurs the stitches and gives an amazing finished look as people will hardly believe that they are crocheted please note that this pattern is not recommended for complete beginners as some crochet amigurumi and working in the round experience would be beneficial you cannot see individual stitches when working with this yarn so you will need to feel for the next stitch tips for working with fluffy yarn are included in the pattern and the skill level would be a level 3 intermediate the **free pattern** can be found ***here*** the printable pdf for purchase is a total of 9 pages including the cover page step-by-step photos and tutorial and face shaping graphics if you are interested in crocheting a smaller version of this teddy bear and bunny check out my **boucle bear and bunny** crochet patterns *** here 1 *** as they are half the size using bulky level 5 yarn we hope you enjoy crocheting your own huggable bears and bunnies you can use the hashtags #crochetfleeceteddy and #crochetfleecebunny when posting your wip and final photos on social media so we can all follow along 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/boucle-bear-and-bunny
